content: Apache 2.2.9 Doesn't support MD5 hashed passwords in the .htpasswd file when running on windows. The password has to be stored in plain text format. If you use a hashed password then it will never let you login past the authentication prompt because it thinks you should be typing the MD5 hash as the password!
title: Apache .htpasswd Files and Windows
name: apache-htpasswd-files-and-windows
